full_title: NIGHTS LIKE THIS by The Kid LAROI
title: NIGHTS LIKE THIS

description.plain:
“NIGHTS LIKE THIS” sees The Kid LAROI singing over eerie and spacey production, reminiscing on certain days and nights he shared with his significant other at the time.

The song’s existence came to light on September 25th, 2022, when Laroi posted a snippet of it to his untilthefirsttime Instagram account, which was created the night prior. The account was used to share snippets and behind the scenes content in the lead-up to his debut studio album, THE FIRST TIME. “NIGHTS LIKE THIS” was the first song previewed on the account.

In January 2023, an extended snippet of the song was previewed in the first official trailer for the album.

embed_content: Read “NIGHTS LIKE THIS” by The Kid LAROI on Genius

Hold my hand until we turn to ashes
Love me 'til they put me in my casket
I got all these feelings that I'm maskin'

Got for you, rented, how'd you forget it?
I think about you and nothin' else
So if you would just come over, I could show you for myself

And it's nights like this when I need your love
